goal.en: To promote the ability to philosophical thinking and writing, to learn to participate in discussion and to raise questions, to train philosophical criticizing and defending, to practice the capacity of judging the matter as it stands and of learning with a modest heart; to help the participants to figure out subject matter of essay and to confine its sphere, to organize the outline, to discuss the methods of writing and its techniques.
goal.ch: 提升哲學思考及寫作能力、學習參與討論及提出問題、訓練哲學批判及防禦能力、練習就事論事及虛心受教的能力，藉以協助同學思考論文主題及設定合理範圍、規劃論文寫作大綱、討論寫作方法及應用技巧。
